fieldDescription: Enables the Tactical Display, an experimental fleet status display during combat.
Shows the Tactical Display only when paused.
Shows the Tactical Display even when UI is turned off (via F11 key by default)
Uses blue instead of green for ship sprites.
Distance of Tactical Display from top of screen.
Distance of Tactical Display from left edge of screen.
Does not display assignment info text (e.g. 'S&D' 'retreat') next to ships. Note: Does not remove controls, thats a separate option.
Removes the ability to click on the Nightcross Tactical Display, making it purely informational.
Shows a separate tactical display for the enemy as well. Note: This is a cheat.
Does not display flux bars for enemies.
Does not display PPT/CR for enemies.
Doesnt render assignment info (escort, etc) for enemy ships.
Removes the 'Nightcross Tactical Display' label. Note: This voids the warranty.
